original_text: And there was found at Achmetha, in the palace that is in the province of the Medes, a roll, and therein was a record thus written:
korean_text: 메대도 악메다 궁성에서 한 두루마리를 찾았으니 거기에 기록하였으되

sentences.original_text: And there was found at Achmetha
in the palace that is in the province of the Medes
and therein was a record thus written:
sentences.korean_translation: 그 안에는 다음과 같이 기록된 문서가 있었음:
